TopicTitle: LY-10 Landing gear being buggy when a kerbal touches it [wheel drops into the runway]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 4GB VRAM | RAM: 32GB 2133 MHz

 

I'm pretty bad with planes, but I tried making one. For the front landing gears, I used the LY-10 landing gear.  I did EVA on the runway with the plane and touched the LY-10 landing gear, and it started acting weird until the kerbal doesn't touch landing gear again. I tried touching the other landing gears at the back of my plane and it didn't do anything.
